title: Perma Banned
body:
I am baffled at the stupidity of this decision. my god hahahaha you only have one game to manage yet you cant manage it properly. how the hell am i perma banned when i play your game 1 time a year??? and mostly im spectating games who's the genius behind this decision?? what kind of third party software am i using?? where are the log files im only using discord why would i cheat when my rank is gold for 3 years now hahaha you made my day!

Man i dont even play this shit i am dota 2 player (divine soon to be immortal) i just came back because i got bored and wanted to see what league is up to
and this happens my god my friends gona laugh at this for a month or two.

I PLAY 1 OR 2 GAMES A YEAR HOW CAN I BE A CHEATER MY RANK HAS BEEN GOLD FOR 3 YEARS HAHAHAHAHAHAHA

replies.body:
> I PLAY 1 OR 2 GAMES A YEAR HOW CAN I BE A CHEATER MY RANK HAS BEEN GOLD FOR 3 YEARS HAHAHAHAHAHAHA

You might want to check that number again since you've played 6 games this year.

> I am baffled at the stupidity of this decision. my god hahahaha you only have one game to manage yet you cant manage it properly. how the hell am i perma banned when i play your game 1 time a year??? and mostly im spectating games who's the genius behind this decision?? what kind of third party software am i using?? where are the log files im only using discord why would i cheat when my rank is gold for 3 years now hahaha you made my day!

My assumption as to why you got permanently banned is because of 1 ranked game that was played on the account in which flash was on F instead of D. Adding to this I think the permanent ban can possibly be removed as it seems like it was a case of a hacked account. Contact [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as they will be able to help you. Have a nice day. :D
